snippet: Supporters of  Silvio Berlusconi, the former prime minister, use billboards and banner-hauling planes to make their point, bringing politics to the air above beach resorts and inspiring a counteroffensive.
abstract: Supporters of former Italian Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi, still smarting from court verdict upholding his conviction for tax fraud, are using billboards and banner-hauling planes to make their point, bringing politics to the air above beach resorts; critics are mounting a counteroffensive.
lead_paragraph: Supporters of  Silvio Berlusconi, the former prime minister, use billboards and banner-hauling planes to make their point, bringing politics to the air above beach resorts and inspiring a counteroffensive.

headline.main: As Berlusconi’s Party Supports Embattled Chief, Critics Retaliate
headline.print_headline: As Berlusconi’s Party Supports Embattled Chief, Critics Retaliate
